kannada_original: ಬರಿ ವಿಷಾದದ ದನಿಗೆ ಪಲುಕ ನೀ ತುಂಬದಿರು ;
english_transliteration: Bari viṣādada danige paluka nī tuṁbadiru ;
english_translation: Do not fill the reply/echo only with the sound of sorrow;

kannada_original: ಇಲ್ಲ ಕಲರವ ಆಗ ಈ ಬಾನ ತುಂಬ.
english_transliteration: Illa kalarava āaga ī bāana tuṁba.
english_translation: Otherwise, there will be no chirping throughout this sky.
Let the black cloud carrying drops come towards the screen/horizon;
There is vitality in the water! – Dear Rama.
